Bitcoin - The security of transaction bl.comment_text: The double-spending of Bitcoins is a theoretical possibility because someone could initiate a Bitcoin transfer, but before the verification calculations are done (around 10 min or so by the average miner), before this calculation is done, the fraudster could then try to initiate a transaction somewhere else? Otherwise I don't understand how or why someone would even try to double-spend Bitcoin, because in the context of regular money, you either have it or you don't.
